com.communote.server.core.common.database

Class DatabaseUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.common.database.DatabaseUpdater
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractLiquibaseDatabaseUpdater

    public abstract class DatabaseUpdater
extends Object
    Component for installing and updating a Communote database to the latest state.

    Since the updater is run as a part of the startup process, implementors have to make sure that the individual changes to the schema or content are not run again if they have already been executed before.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • DatabaseUpdater

        public DatabaseUpdater()

    • Method Detail

      • doExecute

        protected abstract void doExecute(DatabaseUpdateType updateType)
                           throws DatabaseUpdateException
        Will be invoked by execute(DatabaseUpdateType) to do the actual update.
        Parameters:
        updateType - the type of update that should be executed
        Throws:
        DatabaseUpdateException - in case of an error database update error

      • execute

        public void execute(DatabaseUpdateType updateType)
             throws DatabaseUpdateException
        Execute the given update. This method will not check whether updates should be skipped.
        Parameters:
        updateType - the type of update that should be executed
        Throws:
        DatabaseUpdateException - in case of an error database update error

      • skipUpdates

        public boolean skipUpdates()
        Return whether updates should be skipped. This method will return true if the system property is set and has the value "true" (case-insensitive).
        Returns:
        true if updates should be skipped

      • updateDatabase

        public void updateDatabase()
                    throws DatabaseUpdateException
        Executes the first and second pass updates if updates should not be skipped.
        Throws:
        DatabaseUpdateException

      • updaterRunBefore

        public abstract boolean updaterRunBefore()
        Returns whether the updater run at least once against the database. It does not matter which DatabaseUpdateType was executed.
        Returns:
        true if the updater was run before

      • updateRunInSession

        public boolean updateRunInSession(DatabaseUpdateType updateType)
        Return whether this updater has run the given update after this instance was created.
        Parameters:
        updateType - the update type to check for having been run
        Returns:
        true if the update was run
